00046 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 #define CLASS_DESC_OFFSET                   (18)
00048 
00049 #define CLASS_REQ_01_GET_RPOT               (u16)(0x1 << 8)
00050 #define CLASS_REQ_02_GET_IDLE               (u16)(0x2 << 8)
00051 #define CLASS_REQ_03_GET_PTCO               (u16)(0x3 << 8)
00052 #define CLASS_REQ_09_SET_RPOT               (u16)(0x9 << 8)
00053 #define CLASS_REQ_0A_SET_IDLE               (u16)(0xA << 8)
00054 #define CLASS_REQ_0B_SET_PTCO               (u16)(0xB << 8)
00055 
00056 #define HID_RPOT_TYPE_01_INPUT              (0x01)
00057 #define HID_RPOT_TYPE_02_OUTPUT             (0x02)
00058 #define HID_RPOT_TYPE_03_FEATURE            (0x03)
00059

00088 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00089 /* USB HID Report Descriptor                                                                                */
00090 __ALIGN4 static uc8 USB_HID_ReportDesc[] = {
00091     0x06, USAGE_PAGE_L, 0xff,      // USAGE_PAGE (Vendor Defined Page 1)
00092     0x09, 0x01,                    // USAGE (Vendor Usage 1)
00093     0xa1, 0x01,                    // COLLECTION (Application)
00094 
00095     0x09, 0x02,                    //   USAGE (Vendor Usage 2)
00096     0x15, 0x00,                    //   LOGICAL_MINIMUM (0)
00097     0x26, 0xff, 0x00,              //   LOGICAL_MAXIMUM (255)
00098     0x75, 0x08,                    //   REPORT_SIZE (8)
00099     0x95, 0x40,                    //   REPORT_COUNT (64)
00100     0x81, 0x02,                    //   INPUT (Data, Var, Abs)
00101 
00102     0x09, 0x03,                    //   USAGE (Vendor Usage 3)
00103     0x15, 0x00,                    //   LOGICAL_MINIMUM (0)
00104     0x26, 0xff, 0x00,              //   LOGICAL_MAXIMUM (255)
00105     0x75, 0x08,                    //   REPORT_SIZE (8)
00106     0x95, 0x40,                    //   REPORT_COUNT (64)
00107     0x91, 0x02,                    //   OUTPUT (Data, Var, Abs)
00108 
00109     0x09, 0x04,                    //   USAGE (Vendor Usage 4)
00110     0x15, 0x00,                    //   LOGICAL_MINIMUM (0)
00111     0x26, 0xff, 0x00,              //   LOGICAL_MAXIMUM (255)
00112     0x75, 0x08,                    //   REPORT_SIZE (8)
00113     0x95, 0x40,                    //   REPORT_COUNT (64)
00114     0xb1, 0x02,                    //   FEATURE (Data, Var, Abs)
00115 
00116     0xc0                           // END_COLLECTION
00117 };
00118 
00119 __ALIGN4 static u8 gInputReportBuffer[64];
00120 __ALIGN4 static u8 gOutputReportBuffer[64];
00121 __ALIGN4 static u8 gFeatureReportBuffer[64];
00122 static vu32 gIsSetOutputReport = FALSE;
00123 static vu32 gOutputReportLen = 0;
00124 static vu32 gEP2Len = 0;
00125 
00126 static vu32 gIsEP2OUTReady = FALSE;
00127 static vu32 gIsEP1INEmpty = TRUE;
00128 static u32 gIsReadyToLoopBack = FALSE;
00129 
00130 /* Global Function -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00131 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00132   * @brief  USB Class initialization.
00133   * @param  pClass: pointer of USBDCore_Class_TypeDef
00134   * @retval None
00135   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00136 void USBDClass_Init(USBDCore_Class_TypeDef *pClass)
00137 {
00138   pClass->CallBack_MainRoutine.func = USBDClass_MainRoutine;
00139   //pClass->CallBack_MainRoutine.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00140 
00141   pClass->CallBack_Reset.func = USBDClass_Reset;
00142   //pClass->CallBack_Reset.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00143 
00144   //pClass->CallBack_StartOfFrame.func = USBDClass_StartOfFrame;
00145   //pClass->CallBack_StartOfFrame.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00146 
00147   pClass->CallBack_ClassGetDescriptor = USBDClass_Standard_GetDescriptor;
00148   //pClass->CallBack_ClassSetInterface = USBDClass_Standard_SetInterface;
00149   //pClass->CallBack_ClassGetInterface = USBDClass_Standard_GetInterface;
00150 
00151   pClass->CallBack_ClassRequest = USBDClass_Request;
00152   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[1] = USBDClass_Endpoint1;
00153   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[2] = USBDClass_Endpoint2;
00154   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[3] = USBDClass_Endpoint3;
00155   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[4] = USBDClass_Endpoint4;
00156   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[5] = USBDClass_Endpoint5;
00157   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[6] = USBDClass_Endpoint6;
00158   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[7] = USBDClass_Endpoint7;
00159 
00160   #ifdef RETARGET_IS_USB
00161   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[RETARGET_RX_EPT] = SERIAL_USBDClass_RXHandler;
00162   #endif
00163 
00164   return;
00165 }
00166 
00167 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00168 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00169   * @brief  USB Class main routine.
00170   * @param  uPara: Parameter for Class main routine
00171   * @retval None
00172   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00173 static void USBDClass_MainRoutine(u32 uPara)
00174 {
00175   USBDClass_ReportProcess();
00176   USBDClass_EPT1INProcess();
00177   USBDClass_EPT2OUTProcess();
00178 
00179   return;
00180 }
00181 
00182 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00183   * @brief  USB Class Report Process for application.
00184   * @retval None
00185   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00186 static void USBDClass_ReportProcess(void)
00187 {
00188   s32 i;
00189   if (gIsSetOutputReport == TRUE)
00190   {
00191     for (i = gOutputReportLen - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00192     {
00193       gInputReportBuffer[i] = gOutputReportBuffer[i];
00194     }
00195     gIsSetOutputReport = FALSE;
00196   }
00197 
00198   return;
00199 }
00200 
00201 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00202   * @brief  USB Class Endpoint 1 IN Process for application.
00203   * @retval None
00204   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00205 static void USBDClass_EPT1INProcess(void)
00206 {
00207   s32 i;
00208   u32 len;
00209   if (gIsReadyToLoopBack == TRUE)
00210   {
00211     if (gIsEP1INEmpty == TRUE)
00212     {
00213       gIsEP1INEmpty = gIsReadyToLoopBack = FALSE;
00214       for (i = gEP2Len - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00215       {
00216         gInputReportBuffer[i] = gOutputReportBuffer[i];
00217       }
00218       len = USBDCore_EPTGetBufferLen(USBD_EPT1);
00219       USBDCore_EPTWriteINData(USBD_EPT1, (u32 *)gInputReportBuffer, len);
00220     }
00221   }
00222 
00223   return;
00224 }
00225 
00226 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00227   * @brief  USB Class Endpoint 2 OUT Process for application.
00228   * @retval None
00229   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00230 static void USBDClass_EPT2OUTProcess(void)
00231 {
00232   if (gIsEP2OUTReady == TRUE)
00233   {
00234     gEP2Len = USBDCore_EPTReadOUTData(USBD_EPT2, (u32 *)gOutputReportBuffer, 64);
00235 
00236     __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld EP2OUT\t[%02d]\r\n", ++__DBG_USBCount, (int)gEP2Len);
00237     __DBG_USBDump((uc8 *)gOutputReportBuffer, gEP2Len);
00238 
00239     gIsEP2OUTReady = FALSE;
00240     gIsReadyToLoopBack = TRUE;
00241   }
00242 
00243   return;
00244 }
00245

00247   * @brief  USB Class Reset.
00248   * @param  uPara: Parameter for Class Reset.
00249   * @retval None
00250   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00251 static void USBDClass_Reset(u32 uPara)
00252 {
00253   gIsEP1INEmpty = TRUE;
00254 }

00270 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00271   * @brief  USB Device Class Request
00272   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00273   * @retval None
00274   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00275 static void USBDClass_Request(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00276 {
00277   u16 uUSBCmd = *((u16 *)(&(pDev->Request)));
00278 
00279 #ifdef RETARGET_IS_USB
00280   SERIAL_USBDClass_Request(pDev);
00281 #endif
00282 
00283   switch (uUSBCmd)
00284   {
00285     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00286     /* | bRequest             | Data transfer direction | Type                | Recipient   | Data          */
00287     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00288 
00289     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00290     /* | 01_Get Report        | 80_Device-to-Host       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 01A1h         */
00291     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00292     case (CLASS_REQ_01_GET_RPOT | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00293     {
00294       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET RPOT\t[%02d][%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pDev->Request.wValueH, pDev->Request.wLength );
00295       USBDClass_GetReport(pDev);
00296       break;
00297     }
00298     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00299     /* | 02_Get Idle          | 80_Device-to-Host       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 02A1h         */
00300     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00301     case (CLASS_REQ_02_GET_IDLE | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00302     {
00303       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET IDLE\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00304       USBDClass_GetIdle(pDev);
00305       break;
00306     }
00307     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00308     /* | 03_Get Protocol      | 80_Device-to-Host       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 03A1h         */
00309     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00310     case (CLASS_REQ_03_GET_PTCO | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00311     {
00312       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET PTCO\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00313       USBDClass_GetProtocol(pDev);
00314       break;
00315     }
00316     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00317     /* | 09_Set Report        | 00_Host-to-Device       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 0921h         */
00318     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00319     case (CLASS_REQ_09_SET_RPOT | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00320     {
00321       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET RPOT\t[%02d][%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pDev->Request.wValueH, pDev->Request.wLength);
00322       USBDClass_SetReport(pDev);
00323       break;
00324     }
00325     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00326     /* | 0A_Set Idle          | 00_Host-to-Device       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 0A21h         */
00327     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00328     case (CLASS_REQ_0A_SET_IDLE | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00329     {
00330       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET IDLE\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00331       USBDClass_SetIdle(pDev);
00332       break;
00333     }
00334     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00335     /* | 0B_Set Protocol      | 00_Host-to-Device       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 0B21h         */
00336     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00337     case (CLASS_REQ_0B_SET_PTCO | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00338     {
00339       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET PTCO\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00340       USBDClass_SetProtocol(pDev);
00341       break;
00342     }
00343   }
00344 
00345   return;
00346 }
00347 
00348 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00349   * @brief  USB Device Class Standard Request - GET_DESCRIPTOR
00350   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00351   * @retval None
00352   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00353 static void USBDClass_Standard_GetDescriptor(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00354 {
00355   u32 type = pDev->Request.wValueH;
00356 
00357   switch (type)
00358   {
00359     case DESC_TYPE_21_HID:
00360     {
00361       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)((pDev->Desc.pConfnDesc) + CLASS_DESC_OFFSET);
00362       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = DESC_LEN_HID;
00363       pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00364       break;
00365     }
00366     case DESC_TYPE_22_RPOT:
00367     {
00368       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)(USB_HID_ReportDesc);
00369       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = DESC_LEN_RPOT;
00370       pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00371       break;
00372     }
00373     case DESC_TYPE_23_PHY:
00374     {
00375       break;
00376     }
00377   } /* switch (type)                                                                                        */
00378 
00379   return;
00380 }

00408 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00409   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - GET_REPORT
00410   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00411   * @retval None
00412   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00413 static void USBDClass_GetReport(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00414 {
00415   u32 value = pDev->Request.wValueH;
00416   u32 len = pDev->Request.wLength;
00417 
00418   switch (value)
00419   {
00420     case HID_RPOT_TYPE_01_INPUT:
00421     {
00422       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(gInputReportBuffer);
00423       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = len;
00424       pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00425       break;
00426     }
00427     case HID_RPOT_TYPE_03_FEATURE:
00428     {
00429       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(gFeatureReportBuffer);
00430       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = len;
00431       pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00432       break;
00433     }
00434   }
00435 
00436   return;
00437 }
00438 
00439 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00440   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - GET_IDLE
00441   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00442   * @retval None
00443   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00444 static void USBDClass_GetIdle(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00445 {
00446   /* Add your own GET_IDLE function here....
00447      For example....
00448 
00449   u32 uReportID  = pDev->Request.wValueL;
00450   u32 uInterface = pDev->Request.wIndex;
00451 
00452   pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(__IDLE_DURATION_BUFFER[uReportID]);
00453   pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = 1;
00454   pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00455 
00456   */
00457   return;
00458 }

00473   pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = 1;
00474   pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00475

00477   return;

00480 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00481   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - SET_REPORT
00482   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00483   * @retval None
00484   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00485 static void USBDClass_SetReport(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00486 {
00487   u32 value = pDev->Request.wValueH;
00488   u32 len = pDev->Request.wLength;
00489   switch (value)
00490   {
00491     case HID_RPOT_TYPE_02_OUTPUT:
00492     {
00493       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(gOutputReportBuffer);
00494       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = len;
00495       pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAOUT;
00496       pDev->Transfer.CallBack_OUT.func = USBDClass_SetReportCallBack;
00497       pDev->Transfer.CallBack_OUT.uPara = len;
00498       break;
00499     }
00500     case HID_RPOT_TYPE_03_FEATURE:
00501     {
00502       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(gFeatureReportBuffer);
00503       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = len;
00504       pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAOUT;
00505       break;
00506     }
00507   }
00508 
00509   return;
00510 }
00511

00520      For example....

00523   u32 uIdleDuration = pDev->Request.wValueH;
00524   u32 uInterface    = pDev->Request.wIndex;
00525 
00526   __IDLE_DURATION_BUFFER[uReportID] = uIdleDuration;
00527 
00528   */
00529   return;
00530 }

00551 /*********************************************************************************************************//**

00553   * @param  uPara: Parameter for SET_REPORT call back function (SET_REPORT wLength)
00554   * @retval None
00555   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00556 static void USBDClass_SetReportCallBack(u32 uPara)
00557 {
00558   gIsSetOutputReport = TRUE;
00559   gOutputReportLen = uPara;
00560 
00561   return;
00562 }
00563 
00564 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00565   * @brief  USB Class Endpoint handler
00566   * @param  EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00567   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT7
00568   * @retval None
00569   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00570 static void USBDClass_Endpoint1(USBD_EPTn_Enum EPTn)
00571 {
00572   gIsEP1INEmpty = TRUE;
00573 
00574   __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld EP1IN\t[%02d]\r\n", ++__DBG_USBCount, (int)USBDCore_EPTGetBufferLen(EPTn));
00575   __DBG_USBDump((uc8 *)gInputReportBuffer, USBDCore_EPTGetBufferLen(EPTn));
00576 
00577   return;
00578 }
00579 
00580 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00581   * @brief  USB Class Endpoint handler
00582   * @param  EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00583   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT7
00584   * @retval None
00585   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00586 static void USBDClass_Endpoint2(USBD_EPTn_Enum EPTn)
00587 {
00588   gIsEP2OUTReady = TRUE;
00589 
00590   return;
00591 }
